title: I've to do a logo with the similar font of the image. Thanks
author: oparena

comments.content: Well, first of all ... that 'r' is awkward and will not be found in a font. My recommendation of something close would be [Englische Schriebschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826140953/http:/old.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/englische-schreibschrift-bq/familytree.html) and its apparently legal clones.

Thanks Mike F. I´ll use you recomendation but I'm sure that the font is already exits...

Thanks.

I agree with Mike's assessment. If you want some more fonts with a very similar \_E\_ and lowercase shown in the sample, here are a few: Stirling Script CT, Edwardian Script, English 111 Vivace.  
Don
